E-Commerce Checkout System Requirements

Overview
This document outlines the functional requirements for the e-commerce checkout system, including payment processing, discount code functionality, and order validation.

Discount Code Feature

Business Rules
- Valid discount codes: SAVE10, DISCOUNT20, WELCOME15, FIRST10
- SAVE10 provides $10.00 off the total order
- DISCOUNT20 provides $20.00 off the total order  
- WELCOME15 provides $15.00 off the total order
- FIRST10 provides $10.00 off the total order
- Discount codes are case-insensitive
- Only one discount code can be applied per order
- Discount is applied to the subtotal before tax calculation

Validation Rules
- Discount code field accepts alphanumeric characters
- Maximum length: 20 characters
- Invalid codes should display error message: "Invalid discount code"
- Valid codes should display success message: "Discount applied successfully!"
- Apply button should be disabled after successful

Invalid codes should display error message: "Invalid discount code"
- Valid codes should display success message: "Discount applied successfully!"
- Apply button should be disabled after successful application

Error Handling
- Empty discount code should show: "Please enter a discount code"
- Invalid discount codes should show: "Invalid discount code" 
- Network errors should show: "Unable to apply discount code. Please try again."

Form Validation Requirements

Required Fields
All fields marked with asterisk (*) are mandatory:
- First Name: Required, minimum 2 characters
- Last Name: Required, minimum 2 characters  
- Email Address: Required, valid email format
- Street Address: Required, minimum 5 characters
- City: Required, minimum 2 characters
- State: Required, must select from dropdown
- ZIP Code: Required, 5-digit numeric format
- Payment Method: Required selection
- Terms and Conditions: Must be checked

Field Validation Rules
- Email: Must contain @

must select from dropdown
- ZIP Code: Required, 5-digit numeric format
- Payment Method: Required selection
- Terms and Conditions: Must be checked

Field Validation Rules
- Email: Must contain @ symbol and valid domain
- ZIP Code: Must be exactly 5 digits
- Phone: Optional field, no validation required
- Card Number: 16 digits, formatted with spaces
- CVV: 3-4 digits depending on card type
- Expiry Date: Month and year must be future date

Error Messages
Each field should display specific error messages:
- "First name is required"
- "Last name is required" 
- "Valid email address is required"
- "Street address is required"
- "City is required"
- "State selection is required"
- "Valid ZIP code is required"
- "Payment method is required"
- "You must agree to the terms and conditions"

Payment Processing

Supported Payment Methods
- Credit Card (Visa, MasterCard, American Express)
- Debit Card
- PayPal

Card Validation
- Card number must be 16 digits
- CVV

s and conditions"

Payment Processing

Supported Payment Methods
- Credit Card (Visa, MasterCard, American Express)
- Debit Card
- PayPal

Card Validation
- Card number must be 16 digits
- CVV must be 3-4 digits
- Expiry date must be future date
- Cardholder name is required for card payments

Payment Security
- All card details are validated client-side first
- SSL encryption required for transmission
- No card details stored locally
- PCI compliance required

Order Summary Calculation

Price Components
- Subtotal: Sum of all item prices
- Shipping: $9.99 flat rate
- Tax: 8.25% of subtotal
- Discount: Applied after subtotal, before tax
- Total: Subtotal + Shipping + Tax - Discount

Display Format
- All prices displayed with $ symbol
- Two decimal places required
- Discount shown as negative value
- Total highlighted with bold formatting

E-Commerce Checkout Testing Guide

This document provides testing guidelines and test scenarios for the checkout system.

DISCOUNT CODE TESTING

Positive Test Scenarios:
- Enter valid discount code SAVE10 and verify $10 discount is applied
- Enter valid discount code DISCOUNT20 and verify $20 discount is applied  
- Enter valid discount code WELCOME15 and verify $15 discount is applied
- Enter valid discount code FIRST10 and verify $10 discount is applied
- Verify discount codes work in both uppercase and lowercase
- Confirm Apply button becomes disabled after successful application
- Verify success message displays: "Discount applied successfully!"

Negative Test Scenarios:
- Enter invalid discount code and verify error message appears
- Submit empty discount code field and verify validation message
- Try to apply multiple discount codes and verify only one is accepted
- Enter discount code with special characters and verify handling
- Enter discount code longer

d and verify validation message
- Try to apply multiple discount codes and verify only one is accepted
- Enter discount code with special characters and verify handling
- Enter discount code longer than 20 characters and verify truncation

FORM VALIDATION TESTING

Required Field Tests:
Test all required fields show appropriate error messages when left empty:
- First Name field validation
- Last Name field validation  
- Email Address field validation
- Street Address field validation
- City field validation
- State dropdown validation
- ZIP Code field validation
- Payment method selection validation
- Terms and conditions checkbox validation

Field Format Tests:
- Email format validation with invalid formats
- ZIP code accepts only 5-digit numbers
- Phone number field accepts various formats
- Card number formatting with spaces every 4 digits
- CVV accepts 3-4 digit numbers only
- Expiry date validation for future dates

PAYMENT METHOD TESTING

Credit Card

d accepts various formats
- Card number formatting with spaces every 4 digits
- CVV accepts 3-4 digit numbers only
- Expiry date validation for future dates

PAYMENT METHOD TESTING

Credit Card Tests:
- Select credit card payment method
- Verify card details section appears
- Enter valid 16-digit card number
- Test card number formatting (spaces added automatically)
- Enter valid CVV (3-4 digits)
- Select valid expiry month and year
- Enter cardholder name
- Verify all card fields are required when card payment selected

PayPal Tests:
- Select PayPal payment method
- Verify card details section is hidden
- Confirm PayPal-specific validation rules

CHECKOUT PROCESS TESTING

End-to-End Scenarios:
- Complete full checkout process with all valid data
- Verify order summary calculations are correct
- Test checkout with and without discount codes
- Confirm final total matches individual components
- Verify form submission triggers appropriate validation
- Test

summary calculations are correct
- Test checkout with and without discount codes
- Confirm final total matches individual components
- Verify form submission triggers appropriate validation
- Test successful order placement flow

Error Recovery Tests:
- Fill form partially and verify progress is maintained
- Test browser refresh behavior during checkout
- Verify error messages clear when fields are corrected
- Test form reset functionality if available

ACCESSIBILITY TESTING

- Verify all form fields have proper labels
- Test keyboard navigation through all form elements
- Confirm error messages are announced by screen readers
- Verify color contrast meets accessibility standards
- Test with various browser zoom levels

BROWSER COMPATIBILITY

Test checkout functionality across:
- Chrome (latest version)
- Firefox (latest version)  
- Safari (latest version)
- Edge (latest version)
- Mobile browsers (iOS Safari, Android Chrome)

PERFORMANCE TESTING

- Mobile browsers (iOS Safari, Android Chrome)

PERFORMANCE TESTING

- Measure form load time
- Test discount code application response time
- Verify checkout submission performance
- Test with slow network connections
- Monitor memory usage during checkout process
